unnormalised: Campus hiring season is crucial, especially for fresh talent from IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad. Finding the right fit requires thorough screening and assessment. Remember interviews scheduled for 22/07/2024 at 10:00 hrs in Mumbai? Let's ensure a streamlined process. A good onboarding plan till Diwali (01/11/2024) can boost retention, reducing re-hiring efforts. Consider offering Rs. 6 Lakhs CTC. Focus on skills needed for "Make in India" initiatives.
normalised: Campus hiring season is crucial, especially for fresh talent from I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad. Finding the right fit requires thorough screening and assessment. Remember interviews scheduled for twenty second July two thousand and twenty four at ten o'clock hours in Mumbai? Let's ensure a streamlined process. A good onboarding plan till Diwali (first November two thousand and twenty four) can boost retention, reducing re-hiring efforts. Consider offering rupee six lakhs C T C. Focus on skills needed for "Make in India" initiatives.
